hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_CONTROL_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The release control branch you are using. ${release_control_git_hash} is set in the global parameters.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: TARGET_STACK
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Based on selection we determine if it is the a or b stack.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DATASET_S3_OBJECT_KEY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional. If provided this will update the fence_mapping.json

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: INCLUDE_PIC_SURE_API
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Include PIC-SURE API in the build and deploy process

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: INCLUDE_PIC_SURE_FRONTEND
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Include UI in the build and deploy process

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: INCLUDE_PIC_SURE_AUTH_MICRO_APP
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Include PIC-SURE Auth Micro App (PSAMA) in the build and deploy process

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: INCLUDE_PIC_SURE_DICTIONARY
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Include Dictionary in the build and deploy process

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: INCLUDE_PIC_SURE_HPDS_AUTH
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Include Auth HPDS in the build and deploy process

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: INCLUDE_PIC_SURE_HPDS_OPEN
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Include Open HPDS in the build and deploy process
